reporter_caption.center: MATTER OF BUTLER v. FINEGAN, 269 N.Y. 587 (1935)

caption.center: In the Matter of MANNING J. BUTLER, Respondent, against JAMES E. FINEGAN et
al., Constituting the Municipal Civil Service Commission of the City of New

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department.Page 588
opinion.attorneys:
Paul Windels, Corporation Counsel (Edmund L. Palmieri.Paxton Blair and Arthur B. Hoff, Jr., of counsel), for appellants.
Albert de Roode for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Order affirmed, with costs; no opinion.
Concur: CRANE, Ch. J., LEHMAN, HUBBS, CROUCH, LOUGHRAN and FINCH, JJ. Not sitting: O'BRIEN, J.
